description:
Do you feel busy, overwhelmed and under pressure?

Are you frustrated by being busy but not doing the things most important to you?

Then stop right now because this course is for you.

During this course we will look at;

  • The current time pressures and why multitasking is a productivity disaster
  • How values and beliefs are essential in how to achieve goals
  • A quick way to track your time
  • How to plan by starting at the end
  • How getting ahead helps you get more done
  • How you can sow seeds to success in your day
  • How you can get more done when working from home
  • How improving your sleep helps your productivity

This course is made up of videos, each under 3 minutes long.

The course also includes further reading materials and supporting evidence.

You will need 1 hour to complete this course.

If you want to gain back 1 hour per day, without having to start earlier, work longer or work harder then this course is for you.
title: Power Up Your Productivity and Get More Done in Less Time
